name: 3D Off-Road Police Car Racing - eXtreme Dirt Road Wanted Pursuit Game FREE
name_original: 3D Off-Road Police Car Racing - eXtreme Dirt Road Wanted Pursuit Game FREE
description:
Get ready for an absolutely wild racing game where you go FULL speed in your nitro equipped police car down a twisty mountain road!! hang on as you slide through the corners. Watch out for falling rocks that will end your chase quickly. How far can you go?

FEATURES:

* Realistic 3D graphics!
* Multiple camera views!
* Non stop racing action!
